sentence.Network_en: It has two types: luge and bobsleigh.
Luge is the French word for sled.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent. (as a verb): from Swiss French

entry.def: A luge is an object that is designed to be used for racing downhill over snow or ice. Riders lie on their backs and travel with their feet pointing towards the front of the luge.

means.word_mean: 1. a racing sled for one or two people
1. move along on a luge or toboggan
